metadata.title: CVE-2023-3212 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference issue was found in the gfs2 file system in theLinux kernel. It occurs on corrupt gfs2 file systems when the evict codetries to reference the journal descriptor structure after it has been freedand set to NULL. A privileged local user could use this flaw to cause akernel panic.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-4.4').
